snippet.title: Artis Impact - Official Trailer | Pixel Manga Comic-Style JRPG Adventure!
snippet.description:
Set in a mysterious post-apocalyptic world, each map is uniquely hand-drawn from scratch. The game is designed to be simple yet extremely enjoyable, offering a smooth and relaxing experience tailored for solo players.
- An Easy-to-Pick-Up JRPG Experience
- Fast-Paced Turn Based Combat
- High Frame rate pixel animations and Comic-style cutscene
- Interactive exploration and fun adventure

👉 Don't forget to add Artis Impact to your wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1864000/Artis_Impact/

Follow us for updates! You can also reach the developer, Mas, directly via the platforms below:
https://x.com/gentle_mas
https://discord.gg/vr8pHtgBVw
https://www.reddit.com/r/ArtisImpact/

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
